title: Any projects out there open to contributors?

comments.author: Glyph.7805
comments.body:
Currently working on http://gw2pvp.com, looking for anyone who would like to donate their time and wisdom. =)

I can give you an overview of the plan and what needs to be done via PM.

comments.author: stress level zero.4907
comments.body:
http://beta.gw2armory.com

https://github.com/madou/gw2armory.com
https://github.com/madou/api.gw2armory.com

Work in progress, message me if you’re interested. Taking a short break from developing atm though to play HoT ;-).

comments.author: Tao Ythaq.6582
comments.body:
I developped an opensource website http://gw2tool.net/

Source code on GitHub :

  • https://github.com/arnapou/gw2tools
  • https://github.com/arnapou/gw2apiclient

I don’t know if you have frontend or backend skills, but any help would be appreciated to enhance this tool.

comments.author: joemag.4975
comments.body: Hello, I’ve been wanting to contribute to the community for a long time, but I don’t really have the time to dedicate to starting my own project, and I was wondering if there are any projects out there that are open to development contributions? Like I said, I don’t have much time out of my week to work on such things, but I am a professional developer and I’d love to contribute in some small way.
